post.body: Peter, sorry I missed the show last night. I remembered just as it was ending. Next week...
Chris and Morgan, thanks for noticing NoiseTrade's win. Score one for Nashville. BTW, I read your site daily.
Are you the victim?
You rock Peter. Great to talk to you last night. Can't wait to hear the new album.
I phileo Nick. I agape Tim. But I eros you. Happy 50th Lovefest from the former fourth Beatle...
Ha. Vote early and often... Thanks for the support.
Pete, thanks for putting on the Mashable Awards. It's a great service to the community and we are honored for NoiseTrade to win.
"Yesterday"
You rock.
This town ain't big enough for both of us Doc.
Good choice Andy. Colour Revolt definitely makes my 2008 best of list.
They are sleeping after an all night Wii party. I'm just jealous.
"God Rest You Merry Gentlemen" as sung by T-Bone Burnett and Sam Phillips, from the Acoustic Christmas album.
Welcome to the Twitterverse O Wise One. I expect your powerpoint deck and your spreadsheet on my desk by Monday at 9:00.
Lutherans and Lutefisk production? Your geek is showing Ms Malpass...
First Brannon and now you. Is there something in the water over there? Congratulations Mark.
The Sojourn album made it into my Xmas mix, along with Rosie Thomas, Hanson, Vince Guaraldi, Muppets, Cockburn & The Roches.
Dear asshole. Start acting nice or I'm telling Flo on you.
Go one more level of abstraction. Call it I'm Not a Young Man. Henny Yongman. Ha. I crack myself up.
Call it I'm Not Henny.
Her Christmas CD immediately went into my top five. Beautiful stuff
Funniest thing I've heard this morning...
Her version of the Chipmunk song is a revelation. I didn't even realize it was that song till the third listen.
One of my favorite Christmas albums. Also love Hanson, The Roches and the new Rosie Thomas.
I just blogged my thoughts on how NoiseTrade is growing up. http://bit.ly/Ozh9 This is a good week for us.
NoiseTrade won the Mashable People's Choice Award for best music service. Thanks to all who voted for us. http://bit.ly/PCIH
Nashville NPR talks new music models. Interviews with Ten Out Of Tenn, Next Big Nashville and NoiseTrade. hhttp://wpln.org/?p=1481
At the TVC Christmas pageant.
I voted for NoiseTrade in the @mashable Open Web Awards, Music category. Vote here: http://tinyurl.com/mashablefin
Someone saw a snowflake last night, so school is closed for the day. Yeesh...
I watched Derek Webb tell the NoiseTrade story at a NARAS meeting tonight. Reminded again of what a great idea it is.
Benjamin Button affected me more than any other film I saw this year. ICan't stop thinking about family, aging and freedom to start over..
Just watched Man On Wire. Really beautiful and suspenseful. I loved it.
Doing the post Christmas cleanup. Weather is going to hit almost 70 today. Going for a walk after the cleaning is done.
my Twitterank is higher than 80.37% of twitterers! http://twitterank.com/view/joekirk
Merry Christmas everybody. Toddlers don't sleep in on Christmas, so I'm headed to bed for a long winter's nap before the big day.
Tim & Leila Regan-Porter stopping by for coffee on the way home to Atlanta from the Over The Rhine Xmas show in OH. Cool...
